lines.text: But I'm not a Garret, I'm a Brewster. And we Brewsters do what we want to do when we want to do it.
I want another piece of beer.
[holds up ten fingers, then closes five]
then there's Selena's singing lessons, the twins ballet lessons, Father's stock market contributions, Mother's antiques. The leaves you...
Dennis, will you stop drinking for my sake?
Who said I was drinking for your sake?

[looking at her maid under the steam ]
Do you have to stay all day and smoke that thing?
Ah, my dear, I've been drinking for over forty years and I've never acquired the habit yet.
